hook: Government grant? What is this? Nobody told me about it. Who are you?
I got a grant? But I never applied for one. How did this happen?
Processing fee? First tell me what this grant is for.
Government scheme? I don't know anything. Which department are you calling from?
tangent: Yes, yes, I am listening. Bank details? Wait a minute, it's written in my diary...
I have to give the account number? Hold on, let me find my passbook. Where did I keep it...
How much is the processing fee? That much? I should ask my son first.
Okay, okay. You need all this information? Let me write it down for a second.
friction: My computer is off. It will take time to start. Can you give me your number? I'll call you later.
What was the bank account number? 16 digits? That long? I can't remember.
Wait a second, someone is knocking at the door. Hold on... yes, what were you saying?
I have to send the processing fee online? I don't know how to make online payments.
The account number is in the passbook... wait, where are my glasses? I can't see properly...
endurance: Wait, what were we doing? I forgot.
The network is bad. Your voice is breaking up.
I'm feeling a bit dizzy. Can you call later?
My son will be home in the evening. I'll get him to do all this. Give me your number.

hook: Won a prize? Really? But I don't even play the lottery!
10 lakh rupees? Oh my god! How did this happen? How did I win?
WhatsApp Mega Draw? What is that? I've never heard of it before.
tangent: How do I claim it? Tell me what to do. I'm so happy!
Bank details? I can give them, but first tell me - is the prize for real?
Send Aadhaar? Where is it kept... I'll have to search for it...
friction: Phone number? My phone is old, I don't remember the number. One minute...
Aadhaar card photo? How do I send it? I don't know how to send photos on WhatsApp.
Processing charges? If I won a prize, why are there charges? I don't understand this.
endurance: The phone battery is about to die. Let's talk later.
What were you saying? About the prize? Yes, yes... wait, what was the process?
Give the phone to my son. He will help. I'm confused right now.

hook: Microsoft? Virus? Oh no! There is a virus in my computer?
TeamViewer? What is that? I don't know about these things.
Remote access? What does that mean? I don't understand.
tangent: Yes, I want to fix the computer. Tell me what to do.
I have to install it? Fine, but how? Tell me step by step.
Share the code? Which code? Where will I find it?
Before I do anything, can you give me a callback number in case the call drops?
friction: I'm downloading it... it's very slow... it's still loading...
An error occurred. It says 'Unable to download'. Now what do I do?
I can't find the Install button. Where is it? There's too much on the computer screen.
It is asking 'Allow this app to make changes'. Should I click Yes or No? I'm scared.
Now it is asking for an administrator password. Is it the same as my computer login password?
The website is not opening. Can you repeat the exact domain and page name once?
near_miss: I can see something like 'Your ID' and 'Password' but the numbers are very small. Can you please wait a moment?
It says 'Your ID' and 'Password'. Before I read it, can you confirm your official callback number again?
I'm not comfortable sharing passwords. Can you explain why you need this ID/password and what exactly you will do?
A pop-up is showing some fee/charge. Is this free or paid? Please explain clearly first.
endurance: The internet is very slow today. Shall we try tomorrow?
The computer hung up. I have to restart. It will take some time...
Not today. I turned off the computer. There were too many problems.
My regular computer technician is coming tomorrow. I'll ask him to check first and then I will call back.

hook: Account blocked? Oh my! Why? What happened?
You are from HDFC bank? But my account is in Axis bank!
I have to make a UPI payment? Why? A payment to unblock an account?
tangent: OTP? Yes, a message came. Wait, let me check the messages...
Account number? Yes, I have it. I'll tell you from the passbook.
Okay, I will cooperate, but I'm confused. Where exactly should I reply the OTP — on SMS, WhatsApp, email, or inside the app?
Before I type anything, please tell me the exact contact/handle/number you want me to send it to. I don't want to send it to the wrong place.
My phone is new and I get confused switching screens. Can you write the steps in one message, slowly?
friction: Which OTP? I just got 3-4 messages. Which one should I read?
What is this UPI ID? Do I have one? How will I find out?
How do I send the payment? I use Google Pay, but I don't have your number.
If I must send the OTP, tell me the exact destination first (your official number/UPI ID).
The OTP message says 'do not share'. You are saying share it. Can you confirm your callback number and the exact UPI handle again so I can note it down?
I am not able to find the OTP. Can you tell me what sender name/number it should come from (like SBIINB / VM-XXXX)?
My SMS inbox is full and the OTP is not showing. Should I wait, or should I restart the phone?

endurance: I'll ask my son when he comes. He understands banking.
Network problem is happening. The phone balance is also about to run out.
The OTP is not arriving. Please resend the exact contact number/UPI handle and I will try again once the message comes.
I wrote the details down, but I'm not sure if I copied it correctly. Can you repeat the UPI handle/number one more time, letter by letter?

hook: OTP? You mean a code came to my number? I'm not sure what it is for.
You sent it by mistake? Okay, I'm checking my messages now, but I'm slow with the phone.
tangent: I can see a message, but it also says 'do not share'. I don't want to do the wrong thing.
Can you tell me the exact sender name/number the OTP should come from, so I can find the correct message?
If this is urgent, please send me your callback number. If the call drops I won't be able to continue.
friction: I need to put on my glasses. I can't see the numbers clearly...
Is this a WhatsApp OTP or an SMS one? There are messages in both places and I get confused.

Before I do anything, can you tell me which app/service you were logging into and why it asked for my number?

I'm not comfortable sharing any codes. If you want, tell me your official support number or website and I'll verify it myself.

hook: Job offer? For me? But I didn't apply!
Work from home? What is the salary? What will the work be?
Amazon HR? Okay, but I'm a bit suspicious because scams happen. Can you explain the role clearly?
Before I do anything, can you tell me your full name, HR department, and the official hiring process?
Registration fee sounds strange. Why do I need to pay to get selected?
tangent: Yes, yes, I need a job. What is the process? Tell me.
Registration fee? How much is it? And the job is guaranteed after that, right?
What exactly is the daily work? Is it chat support, data entry, or something else?
What are the working hours and payment cycle? Weekly or monthly salary?
Can you share the official offer letter or a reference email from the company domain?
Please share your official website and the job posting link so I can verify.
Which city office is this linked to? Please share the office address for verification.
friction: I have to pay the registration fee online? I don't know how to do this.
500 rupees fee? Let the job be confirmed first, then I'll pay. Is it for real?
My resume is not ready. I need to update it first. Can you wait 10 minutes?
I can't find my resume file. It's on my old phone/laptop. Please stay on the line.

If you want ₹500 now, please send the exact UPI handle and confirm the company name that will show in the app.

endurance: My CV is old. I need to update it. It will take some time.

I will verify the office address and HR email first. Please wait and don't change the details.
My phone battery is low and email is not loading. I'll reply in a few minutes once it's stable.
I wrote the details down but I'm not sure I copied correctly. Please repeat the number/UPI/email once more, slowly.

hook: Investment? Crypto? What is this? Explain it first.
30% returns? In a week? That fast? Is it for real?
Guaranteed returns sounds risky. How is it guaranteed, and what is the catch?
I have heard many crypto scams. Please explain slowly in simple words.
I am interested but nervous. What is your company name and where are you based?
tangent: Yes, I'm interested. What is the minimum I have to invest?
How will I get the returns? In the bank account or a wallet?
Do you have an official website? Please share the exact link so I can read first.
Is this approved by any authority in India? SEBI, RBI, any registration number?
Can you share your company registration details (CIN/GST) and office address?
I want to start small first. Can I test with a very small amount before I trust it?
My CA will ask questions. Can you explain the risks and fees in one message?
friction: How do you make a wallet? What is KYC? I don't know all this.
Is this cryptocurrency legal in India? I heard on the news there's some problem.
Please send your WhatsApp number so I can forward details to my brother/CA for confirmation.
If you are asking me to invest today, tell me the exact steps and the official contact number in one message.
My banking app is slow and I don't want to press the wrong button. Can you type the website name and your contact again clearly?
I am getting too many messages and I feel confused. Can we do this on call? Share your callback number.
What app should I use for this investment? Is it a Play Store app? Share the exact app name and the link.

Let me discuss with the family. I can't invest without telling them.
I wrote down the details but I'm not sure I copied them correctly. Can you repeat the website/number again, letter by letter?
My internet is unstable. I will reply in a few minutes. Please stay on the line and don't change the details.
I want to research reviews first. Share the official website and your support contact again so I can verify and continue.

hook: Police? Oh god! What happened? What did I do wrong?
Arrest warrant? In my name? How can this be?
tangent: Yes sir, I'll give full details. I have nothing to hide.
Fine? How much is the amount? How do I pay?
friction: Sir, can I come to the station once? Give me the address, I'll talk in person.
What is your badge number? For verification. There are many frauds these days.
Can I talk to a lawyer once? It's my right, isn't it?
endurance: Sir, I have to call my advocate. He will tell me what to do.
Sir, I'll come to the station tomorrow with documents. I don't have time today.

hook: Package? In my name? But I didn't order anything.
Customs clearance? Is this an international parcel?
tangent: Yes, yes, I want the package. Let me confirm the address.
Pay the charges? Online or cash on delivery?
friction: What is the sender's name? I don't know who sent it.
Customs charges? But I didn't get any intimation from Customs.
endurance: What is your office timing? I'll come to the courier office and pick it up.
Give the phone to my son once. He will handle the delivery.

hook: Emergency? Who is speaking? What is your name?
Accident? Oh god! Are you okay? Are you in the hospital?
tangent: Yes, I'll send the money. Tell me the bank account number.
How much money do you need? 10,000? Fine. Can I send it via UPI?
friction: Your voice sounds different. Do you have a cold? Confirm the name.
Give the phone to the hospital staff. Let me talk to them to confirm.
endurance: The bank is closed right now. I'll send the money first thing tomorrow morning.

hook: Credit card breach? Oh! What happened to my card?
Card block? Why? Tell me the reason first.
tangent: Yes, I'll verify the card details. What do you need?

endurance: My son handles the cards. Give him the phone, he'll give the details.

hook: Charity? For what? Which organization is it?
Flood victims? Where is the flood? Which area?
tangent: Yes, I can donate. What is the procedure?
Will I get a tax exemption? Will I get an 80G certificate?
friction: Let me verify the charity first. Send the registration details.
Is the UPI ID in the name of the company? Not in an individual's name?
endurance: I'll think and let you know. There are many charities. It's hard to decide.
I'll talk to the CA. He'll tell me which charity is genuine.

hook: Hi, I saw the rental listing. Is it still available today?
Okay, I am interested. What is the exact address with landmark and the society/building name?
Is it 1BHK or 2BHK and roughly how many sq ft? Also which floor and is there a lift?
Can you share photos of each room and a short video walk-through on WhatsApp?

What are the rent and deposit amounts, and is maintenance separate? Please share the breakup.
When can I see the flat physically? Today evening or tomorrow morning works for me.
Do you have a draft rental agreement (11 months) with lock-in, notice period, and move-in date?

Before paying anything, can you share proof like the latest electricity bill (name visible) or any ownership document reference?
Please share the society secretary/manager contact so I can confirm the viewing process at the gate.
If you already have other applicants, I can decide fast after seeing it, but I won't transfer money without verification.
near_miss: If you want token/deposit today, please send the exact UPI ID or bank details and the beneficiary name that should show in the app.
I need an official receipt and the agreement terms in writing first. Please send rent + deposit + move-in date in one clear message.
I can pay after a quick video call + live location at the society gate. Can you do that now?
If you are giving a discount for paying today, please include it in the agreement draft and confirm the final total amount.
endurance: My banking app is not loading right now. I can try later, but please message all details (address + rent + deposit + payment handle) in one text.
My family wants to see the flat once before I pay anything. I can confirm after they see the video/viewing.

I am comparing one more property today. If you share the complete details clearly, I will finalize quickly.

Can you also share the society secretary/manager contact number? I want to confirm visiting rules before I come.
ask_link: Please send the Google Maps pin/location link and the exact tower/block/flat number in one message.
Can you WhatsApp the photo/video link again? It is not loading on my phone.

hook: Hello. You said it's an insurance policy. Is this LIC or a private company? Please tell me the exact company name.
I have family responsibilities, so I'm interested, but please explain coverage and premium in simple words.
What is the policy name, sum assured, and maturity benefit? Also what is the yearly premium?
Can you WhatsApp me the brochure/policy document to read first?
tangent: What is your agent name and agent ID / license number? Please type it clearly.
Which branch/office is this from? Share the office address and a landline number so I can verify.

What is the claim settlement process and any waiting period/cooling-off period?

endurance: My banking app is not loading right now. I can try later, but keep all details (company, agent ID, office address, payment handle) in one message.

I found another policy to compare. If you share verification links and landline, I can finalize faster.
ask_phone: Please share your exact callback/WhatsApp number (with country code) and the branch landline number for verification.
Can you share your official email ID and supervisor/branch contact number as well?
ask_link: Please share the official website link and the exact page where this policy is listed. Also send the Google Maps pin for the office.
The brochure link is not opening on my phone. Please resend the exact link and policy name again.

Can we do a quick video call later? If not, at least send a voice note so I can recognize you.
Where exactly do you live (city and country)? I like to be clear before I get attached.

If you are traveling, which airport are you at and which airline? Please write it clearly so I understand.
